meaning: As a protector and guide to every being She is addressed as Mother.
commentary: It is under a mother’s watchful eye that we all grow and nourish. She understands our needs, reads our mind and fulfils our desires. Our scriptures dictate that the elder brother’s wife, the queen of the land, friend’s wife, Guru’s wife, Mother-in-law, own mother are all to be treated as mother and given the same respect. The synonyms for this name are Janani, Srimata. She is also Veda mata (mother of Vedas). Veda refers to the Jnana. She is the mother for knowledge.
